Discord.DiscordUpdateMessage: @Everyone New Atlas Server Version Detected, Build: @version. The server will restart in @announcebefore.
Discord.DiscordServerUptimeMessage: The Atlas server has been running for @uptime. Restarts are scheduled every @restartinterval. The server will restart in @countdownminutes.
Discord.DiscordServerRestartingMessage: @Everyone The Atlas server will restart in @countdownminutes. It will show online in a few minutes.
Discord.DiscordServerNotRunning: @Everyone The Atlas server was not detected as running. It will start now, and be online within 2-3 Minutes

Twitch.TwitchUpdateMessage: New Atlas Server Version Detected, Build: @version. The server will restart in @announcebefore.
Twitch.TwitchServerUptimeMessage: The Atlas server has been running for @uptime. Restarts are scheduled every @restartinterval. The server will restart in @countdownminutes.
Twitch.TwitchServerRestartingMessage: The Atlas Server is now restarting. It will show online in a few minutes
Twitch.TwitchServerNotRunning: The Atlas server was not detected as running. It will start now, and be online within 2-3 Minutes
